alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 26 at 3:30AM MDT until April 26 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches with locally higher amounts on top of Bartlett and Johnson Mesas. North winds gusting from 30 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes Interstate 25 over Raton Pass. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
